data.title: Santa Maria, CA
data.meta_description: The Santa Maria-Santa Barbara metro is part of the California Central Coast and the Tech Coast, which gets its name from the heavy information technology presence in Southern California.
data.text:
The 5 Greatest Places In Colorado To See Fall Colors

See groves of golden Aspens and more fall colors in Colorado this leaf-peeping season. These are five of the best spots in Colorado for fall colors. Check them out!

2026 Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics—How To Volunteer Or Get Tickets Now

It's time to book a trip to the February 2026 Winter Olympics in Milan and Cortina—the draw for ticket sales is live and the volunteer process begins next month.

AI Instruction Tries Fixing My Golf Swing

My golf game has experienced a power outage the past three years.

The Petit Palais Museum In Paris Presents Street Art For The Very First Time

This summer and fall, the Museum of Fine Arts of the City of Paris, which is housed in the Petit Palais building, is hosting “We Are Here”, on view through November 17, 2024.

Remembering Michel Guérard: The Master Chef Who Invented France’s “Slimming” Cuisine Mincer

A pioneer of French la nouvelle cuisine and his own cuisine mincer, Michel Guerard has died at the age of 91.

At Least One Bottle Of The $7,500 Weller Millennium Is Open. How Is It?

Weller Millennium explores the effects of both extended aging and high wheat content on American whiskey. Innovation aside, how does a $7,500 bottle of whiskey taste?

Devices For Glowing Skin That Aestheticians Love

For estheticians and spa owners, offering cutting-edge treatments with the best professional facial machines is essential to staying

Billionaire Netflix Co-Founder Transforms Utah Ski Resort Into Outdoor Art Museum

Reed Hastings, the former CEO and co-founder of Netflix, bought Powder Mountain last year and is transforming it with an outdoor sculpture park

Giovanni Rosso - A Barolo Success Story (And Now In Etna)

Located in Serralunga d’Alba, on the eastern hills of the Barolo production zone, the origins of the Giovanni Rosso winery date back to 1906.

The Truth About Mazda’s All-New Rotary Sports Car Is Eye-Opening

We originally heard that the rotary engine would just act as a generator in a new-wave Mazda sports car. Now it seems that the rotary will drive the rear wheels!

Mandarin Oriental’s First Hotel In Greece Brings Luxury To The Peloponnese

Away from the overcrowded islands, the new, sustainability-minded Mandarin Oriental Costa Navarino offers fine dining, lavish villas and a close connection with nature

Santa Barbara’s El Encanto, A Belmond Hotel, Curates Activities For Everyone

El Encanto is ideally situated on seven acres of terraced gardens which include strawberry vines, lemon trees and lavender bushes, a vegetable garden and a centuries old lily pond where turtles like to hang out.

Santa Monica’s Proper Hotel Embodies Both Wellness And Fun

The Proper Hotel is a five-star Santa Monica retreat located just a few blocks from the beach. The property welcomes guests with a sleek and calming vibe and specialty offerings.

Paris Olympics 2024: CAS Reject Marta’s Appeal Against Two-Game Suspension

Brazil’s Marta will miss the Paris 2024 Olympic semifinal after CAS rejected her appeal against a two-game suspension. Learn about the ruling and its impact on Brazil’s squad.

The Best Places For Business And Careers 2019: Seattle Still On Top

The Seattle economy grew 8.7% last year or 7% net of inflation, three times the rate of the median U. S. city.
